amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report to Congress on the screening practices for Great Lakes and inland waterways seaports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1753 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4185-4186) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report to Congress on the screening practices for Great Lakes and inland waterways seaports.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1753 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
